ExportItemConfig.Query:
SELECT pt_order.id, order_no, member_id, mm_member.name as member_name, mm_member.usr as member_user, merchant_id, shop_id, replace(items_info,'\n','
') as items_info, total_fee, fee, pay_fee, payment_opt, is_paid, payment_sign, note, status, paid_time, create_time, deliver_time, pt_order.update_time FROM pt_order INNER JOIN mm_member ON mm_member.id=pt_order.member_id WHERE merchant_id={merchant_id} AND ({is_paid} = -1 OR is_paid={is_paid}) AND ({status}>99 OR status={status}) AND (items_info LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR mm_member.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR mm_member.usr LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR pt_order.order_no LIKE '%{keyword}%') ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
